The wolf bot nonetheless started a scan for damages so he could better 
identify them.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> ???::
> 
> The control panel opened and showed the protophorm's status. The 
> report said that the Proptophorm was damaged but alive, its 
beastmode 
> had been taken and it was in stasis lock. The control panel reported 
> too that the a full scan of damage was advisable before a reparation 
> process.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang: What the? Hey, Hot, this thing has a Maximal insignia 
on 
> > it. You think this can be another pod or a transformer?
> >

> >

> > >

> The

cibertronian.

> wolf 
> > > mode

> sniff

> almost

> since

> > > > > first Beast Wars
> > > > >
